energy.usef.core.util

Class PowerUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • energy.usef.core.util.PowerUtil

  • public class PowerUtil
extends Object
    Util class to do some transformations between power and energy.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static BigDecimal megaWattHourPriceToWattPricePerPtu(BigDecimal price, Integer ptuDuration)
      Converts the price of a MWh to the price for a Watt during for a PTU.
      static BigInteger powerToEnergy(BigInteger power, Integer ptuDuration)
      Transforms a power (Watt) of a PTU to an energy (Watt hour).
      static BigDecimal wattPricePerPTUToMWhPrice(BigInteger power, BigDecimal price, Integer ptuDuration)
      Transforms price for an amount of power (Watt) per ptu into price of one (Mega Watt hour) based on ptu duration.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • powerToEnergy

        public static BigInteger powerToEnergy(BigInteger power,
                                       Integer ptuDuration)
        Transforms a power (Watt) of a PTU to an energy (Watt hour).
        Parameters:
        power - BigInteger power expressed in Watts
        ptuDuration - PTU duration
        Returns:
        the energy expressed in Watt hours

      • wattPricePerPTUToMWhPrice

        public static BigDecimal wattPricePerPTUToMWhPrice(BigInteger power,
                                                   BigDecimal price,
                                                   Integer ptuDuration)
        Transforms price for an amount of power (Watt) per ptu into price of one (Mega Watt hour) based on ptu duration.
        Parameters:
        power - (@link BigInteger) power expressed in Watts
        price - (@link BigInteger) price for the power
        ptuDuration - PTU duration (in minutes)
        Returns:
        the price of one Mega Watt hours (MWh)

      • megaWattHourPriceToWattPricePerPtu

        public static BigDecimal megaWattHourPriceToWattPricePerPtu(BigDecimal price,
                                                            Integer ptuDuration)
        Converts the price of a MWh to the price for a Watt during for a PTU.
        Parameters:
        price - BigDecimal price for 1 MWh.
        ptuDuration - Integer duration of a PTU in minutes.
        Returns:
        the price for 1 W during a PTU.
